layout.singingstanza: Je -- sus is here! He's back a -- gain! We'd bet -- ter take our par -- a -- lyzed friend. There's such a crowd! There's no way in! We've got to get our friend to Him! They re -- moved the roof and they low -- ered Him in; Je -- sus see -- ing their faith said: Your sins are for -- giv'n. Rise, take up your mat and go to your (Child, your sins are all for -- giv -- en!) Rise, take up your mat and go to your house.

lyrics.stanza: Jesus is here! He's back again! We'd better take our paralyzed friend. There's such a crowd! There's no way in! We've got to get our friend to Him! They removed the roof and they lowered Him in; Jesus seeing their faith said: Your sins are forgiv'n. Rise, take up your mat and go to your (Child, your sins are all forgiven!) Rise, take up your mat and go to your house.
